testsuite.test:
AddressBookItem get setAttributeValue Verify it s callable and sets fullName property correct
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getAttributeValue Verify returns undefined for non assigned attribute
Instructions: 1) Make sure that the 'title' for addressbook item with ID '47'. 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getAttributeValue Throw INVALID PARAMETER for not existing attribute
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getAvailableAttributes Verify it s an array
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getAvailableAttributes Verify content
Instructions: 1) Find out all possible attributes a contact can have. 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: Are those all possible attributes?

getAddressGroupNames Verify content
Instructions: 1) Make sure an address book item with the ID "47" exists. 2) Add this contact at least into one group. 3) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: Are those groups correct?
